text: Aur yeh log jab ikatthey Allah ke saamne be-naqab hongey to us waqt in mein se jo duniya mein kamzor thay woh un logon se jo baday baney huey thay, kahenge “ duniya mein hum tumhare tabey thay, ab kya tum Allah ke azaab se humko bachane ke liye bhi kuch kar sakte ho?” Woh jawab denge “agar Allah ne humein najaat ki koi raah dikhayi hoti to hum zaroor tumhein bhi dikha dete, ab to yaksan hai, khwa hum jaza fazaa karein ya sabr, bahar haal hamare bachne ki koi surat nahin”
